name: Doctor Galaxy
summary: A wild, comedic sci-fi sandbox where you become the galaxy’s maddest scientist. Create absurd alien creatures by mixing bizarre body parts, customizing them with outrageous designs, and sending them on strange missions. Paint them, print them, and experiment endlessly in VR. With surreal humor and limitless creativity, no two creatures—or disasters—are ever the same. Join the chaos and help shape the universe!
